Text:
I've mounted the image on daemon tools, but when it try to load the initial menu, it simply freezes. I'm not even able to open the menu with a right-click on the emulated disc. My daemon tools is fine, I can open other .cue files.
Does anyone have a clue on this lil problem?
Yeah i also downloaded this game and mounted it with daemon tools and it froze. But i waited couple minutes and the installation started. Maybe if you do that, the installation will start by itself!
It happened to me too . i think its a daemon tools problem , i mounted with power iso and it worked just fine;)
daemon tool lite's problem confirmed, according to yougos's comment, please use powerISO

It worked perfectly with Daemon Tools Pro for me.
1. Mount the disk
2. Click open the folder to view files
3. Launch setup.exe
4. Install
5. Have Fun!
